widgets.label: auto
auto
auto

widgets.onValue:
set('addrRefVal', get('addrSwitch'))
var count = Object.keys(get('srcData')).length;
var colorArr = get('mixColorsArr')

// functionnn show bank switch if count < than settings max sources
function checkBankView() {
  if(count > get('maxSRCs_SETT')){
    set('showBankSwitch', true)
    set('leftAlignMixer_MIX', '16%')
    set('widthMixer_MIX', '69%')
    if(get('addrSwitch') == '#') set('bankSw_MIX', get('bankSw_MIX'))
    else if(get('addrSwitch') == 'batch#') set('bankSw_MIX', 1)
  }
  else {
    set('showBankSwitch', 0)
    set('leftAlignMixer_MIX', '11%')
    set('widthMixer_MIX', '74%')
  }
}



if(get('addrSwitch') == '#') {
  //store selector value and reset after sync
  var prevSelState
  if(typeof get('selector') != 'undefined') prevSelState = get('selector').id
  
  set('colorFader', colorArr[0][0])
  set('showMixer', true)
  set('showMixerAdds', true)
  set('showCC', false)
  set('showSingle', false)
  set('showCurSelector', false)
  set('showInfo', false)
  set('showNameIn', false)
  set('selChoiceDDGeo', "none")
  set('selChoiceDDGeo1', "none")
  
  //sync
    for(var j=0; j<count; j++){
      send(get('oscTarget'), '/vimix/#'+j+'/sync',  {type: 'f', value: value})
    }
  checkBankView()
  //reset setting previous state
  setTimeout(function() {
    //set('locUpdateBtn_SETT', syncAllowState)
    set('selector', {"id":prevSelState})
  }, 100);
  
}

else if(get('addrSwitch') == 'batch#') {
  
  set('colorFader', colorArr[1][1])
  set('showMixer', true)
  set('showMixerAdds', true)
  set('showCC', false)
  set('showSingle', false)
  set('showCurSelector', false)
  set('showInfo', false)
  set('showNameIn', false)
  set('selChoiceDDGeo', "batch#")
  set('selChoiceDDGeo1', "batch#")
  //sync
  send(get('oscTarget'), '/vimix/batch#0/sync',  {type: 'f', value: value})
  checkBankView()

}
else if(get('addrSwitch') == 'all'){
  set('colorFader', colorArr[2][2])
  set('topPosition', '35.5%')
  set('showCC', true)
  set('showCurSelector', false)
  set('showNameIn', false)
  set('showInfo', false)
  set('showMixer', false)
  set('showMixer2', false)
  set('showMixer3', false)
  set('showMixerAdds', false)
  set('showBankSwitch', false)
  set('showSingle', true)
  set('faderHeight_MIX', '12%')
  set('sliderAddrVar_Mix', '/vimix/all/alpha/')
  set('selChoiceDDGeo', "none")
  set('selChoiceDDGeo1', "none")
}
else if(get('addrSwitch') == 'current') {
  set('colorFader', colorArr[3][3])
  set('topPosition', '30.5%')
  set('topPositionLabel', '31.5%')
  set('faderHeight_MIX', '12%')
  set('showCC', true)
  set('showCurSelector', true)
  set('showMixer', false)
  set('showMixer2', false)
  set('showMixer3', false)
  set('showMixerAdds', false)
  set('showBankSwitch', false)
  set('showSingle', true)
  set('showInfo', false)
  set('showNameIn', false)
  set('sliderAddrVar_Mix', '/vimix/current/alpha')
  send(get('oscTarget'), '/vimix/current/sync',  {type: 'f', value: value})
  set('selChoiceDDGeo', "current")
  set('selChoiceDDGeo1', "current")
}

else if(get('addrSwitch') == 'selection') {
  set('colorFader', colorArr[4][4])
  set('topPosition', '48%')
  set('showCC', true)
  set('showCurSelector', false)
  set('showInfo', true)
  set('showNameIn', false)
  set('showMixer', false)
  set('showMixer2', false)
  set('showMixer3', false)
  set('showMixerAdds', false)
  set('showBankSwitch', false)
  set('showSingle', true)
  set('faderHeight_MIX', '12%')
  send(get('oscTarget'), '/vimix/selection/sync',  {type: 'f', value: value})
  set('sliderAddrVar_Mix', '/vimix/selection/alpha')
  set('selChoiceDDGeo', "selection")
  set('selChoiceDDGeo1', "selection")
}
else if(get('addrSwitch') == 'byName') {
  set('colorFader', colorArr[5][5])
  set('topPosition', '50%')
  set('showCC', true)
  set('showCurSelector', false)
  set('showInfo', false)
  set('showNameIn', true)
  set('showMixer', false)
  set('showMixer2', false)
  set('showMixer3', false)
  set('showMixerAdds', false)
  set('showBankSwitch', false)
  set('showSingle', true)
  set('faderHeight_MIX', '12%')
  send(get('oscTarget'), '/vimix/'+get('srcNameIn')+'/sync',  {type: 'f', value: value})
  set('sliderAddrVar_Mix', '/vimix/'+get('srcNameIn')+'/alpha')
  set('selChoiceDDGeo', "none")
  set('selChoiceDDGeo1', "none")
}

widgets.onValue:
// mapping function
function scale(number, inMin, inMax, outMin, outMax) {
    return (number - inMin) * (outMax - outMin) / (inMax - inMin) + outMin;
}

var curPoints = get('cornerMovePad_DEF')
var prevs = [
  scale(curPoints[0],0,0.5, 0, 1),
  scale(curPoints[1],0,0.5, 0, 1),
  scale(curPoints[2],0,0.5, 0, 1),
  scale(curPoints[3],0.5,1,-1, 0),
  scale(curPoints[4],0.5,1, -1, 0),
  scale(curPoints[5],0,0.5, 0, 1),
  scale(curPoints[6],0.5,1, -1, 0),
  scale(curPoints[7],0.5,1,-1, 0)
  ]
send(get('oscTarget'), get('addrVarGeo') + '/corner' , prevs[0], prevs[1], 0, 1, prevs[4], prevs[5], prevs[6], prevs[7])

set('cornerMovePad_DEF',
  [
    curPoints[0],
    curPoints[1],
    0,
    1,
    curPoints[4],
    curPoints[5],
    curPoints[6],
    curPoints[7]
  ]
)

    return (number - inMin) * (outMax - outMin) / (inMax - inMin) + outMin;
}

var curPoints = get('cornerMovePad_DEF')

widgets.props:
JS{
var props = {}

var idf = 'filCue'+($+1)
var cueDatArr = @{filterCueData}[idf]
var cueObj = cueDatArr[0]

var src = cueObj["src"]
var filter = cueObj["filter"]
var algo = cueObj["algo"]
var start = cueObj["start"] 
var end = cueObj["end"]

filter = filter.toUpperCase()

props.value = src + '---' + filter + '---' + algo + '///'+ start.toFixed(3) +'<->' + end.toFixed(3)


return props
}

JS{
var props = {}

var idf = 'filCue'+($+15)
var cueDatArr = @{filterCueData}[idf]
var cueObj = cueDatArr[0]

var src = cueObj["src"]
var filter = cueObj["filter"]
var algo = cueObj["algo"]
var start = cueObj["start"] 
var end = cueObj["end"]

filter = filter.toUpperCase()

props.value = src + '---' + filter + '---' + algo + '///'+ start.toFixed(3) +'<->' + end.toFixed(3)


return props
}

JS{
var props = {}

var idf = 'filCue'+($+29)
var cueDatArr = @{filterCueData}[idf]
var cueObj = cueDatArr[0]

var src = cueObj["src"]
var filter = cueObj["filter"]
var algo = cueObj["algo"]
var start = cueObj["start"] 
var end = cueObj["end"]

filter = filter.toUpperCase()

props.value = src + '---' + filter + '---' + algo + '///'+ start.toFixed(3) +'<->' + end.toFixed(3)


return props
}
